name: BeaverMania
description:
-----Game Synopsis-----
BeaverMania is an Action platform game that let you play as otter 

your looking for your friend who gone missing after wasps start attacking the isles 

as otter you have the ability to build bridges around the world , build and fight your way to find your friend 

we encrouge you to look around the world we put alot of time into it and we hope you will enjoy our game 

-----Controls-----
WASD - Movements

Space/ double space - Jump / Double Jump

Left click - Attacking 

Left click + Space - Hurrican Kick 

Right Click - Throwing rocks 

Ctrl - Lock Bridge / If you have logs you also put them to construct the bridge ( you need first to have Bridge Base )

Esc - Pause Menu 

-----Game Status-----

the game is in pre access

made the game with Yonatan Golan
